ygData.subject: Hail and well met, EQ_rainbow!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi All! Fairly New to the Game, as well as this list, so here s my info... First Name: Gates City/State/Country: Mystic, CT, USA Gender: Male Home Page: none
ygData.messageBody:
Hi All!

Fairly New to the Game, as well as this list, so here's my info...

First Name:
Gates

City/State/Country:
Mystic, CT, USA

Gender:
Male

Home Page:
none (in this day and age!)

Relationship status:
Happily 'married' for 3 years now

Main Character (Name-Server-Class-Race-Level):
Rhiordan, a 9th level Wood Elf Druid on Morrell Thule

Any other characters (Name-Server-Class-Race-Level):
Nope. Should I really restart on Rodcet Nife?

Favorite EQ Monster: Dwarf Skeletons, lots of XPs & Goodies, not too
many surprises

Most Hated EQ Monster: 6 Goblins, all whomping on my poor druid butt
at the same time!

Favorite TV Show: Will & Grace, ER, The Practice, The Sopranos, Sex
and the City. Looking forward to Queer As Folk in December!

Favorite Author: Stephen King, Robert Heinlein, Tom Dietz

Any non-EQ hobbies: Reading, Cooking, Travel, Spending time with my
Hubbie & our dog
